channel.title: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!
channel.description:
hello , I'm stevel70 , and I'm looking to remake toontown , or make a toontown private server :). TOONTOWN CLOSED SEPT , 19 , 2013 1.) python developers who have been doing python for a while. 2.) people who know how to use Panda3D 3.)people who know how to use Geany
4.)people who would know how to remake toontown online the game made by Disney 5.) I have all the models and maps and animations , just need to add them into the correct places but I don't know how sadly.
thanks guys , really hope I get some replies :D!!!
message me on Skype if you meet the requirements , Skype name: stevel7777777 email : dog9furry@aol.com

item.title: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:9, topic:541853”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=660721.msg4417669#msg4417669 date=1396735115]
Please, send me a quick quote of one of my previous comments where I stated this wouldn’t be worth the time. It had a good player base and people obviously miss it being gone, so it should be re-created. I was telling OP that he shouldn’t expect other people to re-create it so he can be the savior of ToonTown.
[/quote]

Re-create a game that would be more appreciated by people, like Unreal 1997.

as there was no obvious sign of who you were directing this towards, it’s only safe to guess that “[you] re-create a game that would be more appreciated by people.” was heavily towards that of the OP. as he is the one wanting to create it. (clearly we can tell he doesn’t have the capability – but those are his means.)

that being said, it is implied that you are saying toontown is not going to be appreciated by anyone, or less appreciated than by another [unreal '97] game.

@also - the game is already being developed [see above]
@OP - perhaps you may have some content that toontownrewritten doesn’t have - maybe try contacting the developers.[/quote]

Yes, I insinuated less appreciation of one game of the other, however, I didn’t state that it wouldn’t be appreciated.

Read full topic
item.source: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!

item.title: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

The Web Guy:

Please, send me a quick quote of one of my previous comments where I stated this wouldn’t be worth the time. It had a good player base and people obviously miss it being gone, so it should be re-created. I was telling OP that he shouldn’t expect other people to re-create it so he can be the savior of ToonTown.

The Web Guy:

Re-create a game that would be more appreciated by people, like Unreal 1997.

as there was no obvious sign of who you were directing this towards, it’s only safe to guess that “[you] re-create a game that would be more appreciated by people.” was heavily towards that of the OP. as he is the one wanting to create it. (clearly we can tell he doesn’t have the capability – but those are his means.)

that being said, it is implied that you are saying toontown is not going to be appreciated by anyone, or less appreciated than by another [unreal '97] game.

@also - the game is already being developed [see above]
@OP - perhaps you may have some content that toontownrewritten doesn’t have - maybe try contacting the developers.

Read full topic

item.title: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:541853”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=660721.msg4417619#msg4417619 date=1396717475]
Re-create a game that would be more appreciated by people, like Unreal 1997.
[/quote]just because you weren’t apart of the community, doesn’t mean this won’t be appreciated. toontown had a great playerbase, and you’re an idiot for thinking that this wouldn’t be worth the time.

@OP - i suggest not trying to attempt something when you have no knowledge of doing so.

if you’re looking to recreate the game, to be the ‘saviour’ and be appraised for something that isn’t yours, think again.
if you’re a fan looking to get his fix back, swing on over to https://www.toontownrewritten.com[/quote]

Please, send me a quick quote of one of my previous comments where I stated this wouldn’t be worth the time. It had a good player base and people obviously miss it being gone, so it should be re-created. I was telling OP that he shouldn’t expect other people to re-create it so he can be the savior of ToonTown.

Read full topic
item.source: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!

item.title: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:6, topic:541853”]Re-create a game that would be more appreciated by people, like Unreal 1997.[/quote]just because you weren’t apart of the community, doesn’t mean this won’t be appreciated. toontown had a great playerbase, and you’re an idiot for thinking that this wouldn’t be worth the time.

@OP - i suggest not trying to attempt something when you have no knowledge of doing so.

if you’re looking to recreate the game, to be the ‘saviour’ and be appraised for something that isn’t yours, think again.
if you’re a fan looking to get his fix back, swing on over to https://www.toontownrewritten.com

item.title: LOOKING TO REMAKE TOONTOWN ONLINE NEED PYTHON DEVElOPERS!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:3, topic:541853”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=660721.msg4417609#msg4417609 date=1396711337]
It seems like you’re just a ToonTown fan that misses it and wants other people to put it back for you, so you can play.

[/quote]And the problem is? It seems like there may still be a clientele.[/quote]

The problem is that he wants other to do it, and by the sounds of it he will be the “re-re-leaser” of ToonTown while others did the work, so he can take credit
